title: Does Sated devour work with Bard meeps?
body: does sated procs bard meeps if they are enough available?

replies.body: Even if they did, that means you are throwing two meeps of damage but not of Slows, which is what you would ideally want because Bard's Damage is mediocre at best.
So does that mean it doesn't?
He means it will deal three meeps worth of damage in two auto attacks (when sated), but you will only apply a slow for the latest meep hit (the slow duration doesn't stack.)
the better question is, why would you ever build sated on bard anyways?
if you're building any kind of jungle item on bard, please don't play ranked.

Bard jungle is actually good. His first clear sucks, but once he gets his first item completed, he becomes very effective. He has some of the best ganks in the game thanks to magical journey, his Q, and his ult. Plus the chimes let him roam the map fast as hell.
